channel.title: web3 on Dojo Viz
channel.description: Recent content in web3 on Dojo Viz

item.title: Coldwallet tips
item.description: Coldwallet Tips & Suggestions As everyone got used to these days, crypto is the safest method of storing and spending money. And as the market is getting hotter you need to be ready for the next bullrun. But of course there will be enough bad guys when there is that much money and action involved. I have seen it with my eyes when my fried was hacked for around $ 800k.

item.title: web3 Security Audit
item.description: the web3 Security Audit Extreme Measure : Separating everything with already hardened laptops. You can DIY your laptop like that, but it needs tons of time and research, so if you like this stuff, it is always good to know but not recommended for non-tech people. ðŸ”—General Usage Tips : General usage suggestions applied to all computers and operating systems. BUT I will not suggest using Windows. Linux > MacOS > Windows.
